<Text: The Humber is a large tidal estuary on the east coast of Northern England.>
Triplets:<The Humber
1:
--------------------
Text: Humber:  It is formed at Trent Falls, Faxfleet, by the confluence of the tidal rivers Ouse and Trent.
Triplets:<Humber
3:
--------------------
Text: Humber:  Although the Humber is an estuary from the point at which it is formed, many maps show it as the River Humber.
